item.title: Ami Stewart - Knock On Wood
item.description:
I don’t want
to lose you
This good thing
that I got
‘Cause if I do
I will surely
Surely lose a lot
‘cause your love
Is better
than any love I know
It’s like thunder
and lightning
The way you love me
is frightening
You better knock knock
knock on wood baby-

I’m not superstitious
about you
But I can’t take
no chance
I got me spinning baby
you know
I’m in a trance
‘cause your love
Is better
than any love I know
It’s like thunder
and lightning
The way you love me
is frightening
You better knock knock
knock on wood baby-

Think I better knock
knock knock on wood
Think I better knock
knock knock on wood
Think I better knock
knock knock on wood
Think I better knock
knock knock on wood
Think I better
knock-

It’s no secret
about it
‘Cause with
this loving touch
He seems doing
that I get enough
Feel his touch
all over
You know
it means so much
It’s like thunder
and lightning
The way you love me
is frightening
You better knock knock
knock on wood baby

knock knock on wood
